issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:â€¨
While testing Base UI>Window NavBar, I clicked "Button with image" and then "title prompt". This is not the order I usually followed. When I clicked "title prompt", the navbar gets larger. At that point I noticed that the button with image moved well in advance of the navbar size change. 

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS on device
2) Navigate to Base UI>Window NavBar
3) Click "button with image"
4) Click "title prompt"

Result:
The button with image moves well ahead of the navbar size change

Expected result:
The button with image moves at the same time as the navbar size increases.
fields.summary: Kitchensink: Base UI>Window NavBar, button with image animates well in advance of navbar size change
fields.environment: Mac OS X 10.6.8, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.4.201108101535, SDK 1.7.2 GA, SDK 1.7.3.v20110928143011, iPhone 4, iPad touch 4th Gen, iOS 5.0, iOS 4.3

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
